alp.core
Class Design

java.lang.Object
  SparseGraph
      alp.core.Design

public class Design
extends SparseGraph

A hardware design which consists of an Component set and an Signal set.

Version:
January, 2009
Author:
Ricardo Menotti, Author Page, DC UFSCar
See Also:

addGlobalComponent

public Component addGlobalComponent(Component comp)
Include the Component in the globalComponents Map. This components are not included into graph representation and are used to links like clk signals

Parameters:
comp -
Returns:
A reference to the added component
